misc: Runs his mouth all the time
Constantly sees birds and other wildlife on the course
Might stand on the ball for quite some time in the tee box
biography: Juuso, a familiar face from Hyvinkään Golf, brings a unique blend of competitive spirit and colorful commentary to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his loquacious nature, Juuso never shies away from sharing his thoughts on the game, the course, or anything else that crosses his mind.

A keen observer of nature, Juuso often finds himself distracted by the avian and wildlife inhabitants of the golf course. It is not uncommon to hear him remark on the beauty of a bird in flight or the curious antics of squirrels, adding a touch of whimsy to his otherwise serious approach to the game.

While his pre-shot routine might test the patience of his playing partners—particularly his tendency to scrutinize his ball's alignment on the tee box for an extended period—Juuso's dedication to precision is undeniable. Having participated in 8 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Juuso is still searching for his first victory. Although he will not be playing in the Hector Trophée 2025, there is always a chance of a last-minute change.
